title: Starmer warns ‘very significant volume of material’ needs reviewing before Mandelson documents released – UK politics live
summary_full: Control over which files can be released into the public domain has been ceded to Parliament’s Intelligence and Security CommitteeAs speculation over Starmer’s future as prime minister continues, Brown has come to his defence, saying he is “a man of integrity”.But he acknowledged that Starmer is facing a “serious” battle to keep his job. Continue reading...
